<h3 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc23046558"
id="_Toc23046558"></a><a name="_Toc26088728" id=
"_Toc26088728">Examples:</a></h3>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="Code10BoldCharCharCharCharChar1Char">*XYPLOT</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp; FREQ=5</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp; MACRO=1</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;&nbsp; NAME=example_3a X=2 Y=8</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp; MICRO=0</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="Code10BoldCharCharCharCharChar1Char">*XYPLOT</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp; FREQ=1</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp; LAMINATE=1</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;&nbsp; NAME=kxy_v_Mxy X=9 Y=15</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp; MACRO=2</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;&nbsp; NAME=my_plot_file LYR=1 X=2 Y=8 COORD=G</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;&nbsp; NAME=&CloseCurlyDoubleQuote; LYR=3 X=2 Y=14</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp; MICRO=1</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;&nbsp; NAME=micro_file LYR=2 IB=1 IG=1 X=2 Y=8</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;</p>
<h3><a name="_Toc23046559" id="_Toc23046559"></a><a name=
"_Toc26088729" id="_Toc26088729">Associated MAC/GMC 4.0 Example
Problem(s):</a></h3>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Example 1c, Example 2a-h, Example 3a-i,
Example&nbsp; 4a-d, Example 4h, Example 5b, Example 5d-f,
<b>Example 6a</b>, Example 6b-c, Example 7a-c</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc23046560"
id="_Toc23046560"></a><a name="_Toc26088730" id=
"_Toc26088730">Notes:</a></h3>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
1)&nbsp;&nbsp; The x-y plot&nbsp;information associated with
laminate&nbsp;level plots should only be specified in the special
case&nbsp;of laminate analysis.&nbsp; Further, the specification of
<span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:10.0pt;color:blue'>LYR=</span></span><span class=
"normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; color:blue'>lyr_mac</span></span><span class="normalitalicChar"><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;color:blue;font-style:normal'>,</span></span>
<span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:10.0pt;color:blue'>LYR=</span></span><span class=
"normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; color:blue'>lyr_mic,</span></span>
<span class="normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;font-style:normal'>and</span></span>
<span style=
'font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"; color:blue'>COORD=</span><span class="normalitalicChar"><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; color:blue'>coord</span></span>
<span class="normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;font-style:normal'>for the
macro and micro plots is only required in the special case of a
laminate in order</span></span><span class=
"normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; font-style:normal'>&nbsp;to
indicate which layer</span></span><span class=
"normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; font-style:normal'>&nbsp;the
RUC or subcell information should be taken from.</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
2)&nbsp;&nbsp; Laminate level plot files have
&OpenCurlyDoubleQuote;<span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>_lam.data</span></span>&CloseCurlyDoubleQuote;
appended to the specified <i><span style=
'color:blue'>name_l</span></i>.&nbsp; Macro level plot files have
&OpenCurlyDoubleQuote;<span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>_macro.data</span></span>&CloseCurlyDoubleQuote;
appended to the specified <i>name_mac</i>. &nbsp;Micro level plot
files have &OpenCurlyDoubleQuote;<span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>_micro.data</span></span>&CloseCurlyDoubleQuote;
appended to the specified <i>name_mic</i>.&nbsp; The files will be
written in the same directory&nbsp;as the input file.&nbsp; If a
name is repeated within a particular level of plots, an integer
counter will be appended to the specified file name.&nbsp; Finally,
the special character double quotation (&OpenCurlyDoubleQuote;) can
be specified as a file name to automatically repeat the file name
directly preceeding this specification (see Example above).</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
3)&nbsp;&nbsp; The macro and micro plot files associated with a
laminate&nbsp;contain four columns of data rather than two.&nbsp;
The first two columns contain the <i>x</i> and <i>y</i> data for
quadrature point number 1 in the specified layer, while the third
and fourth columns contain the <i>x</i> and <i>y</i> data for
quadrature point number 2 in the specified layer.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
4)&nbsp;&nbsp; Even in the case of laminate&nbsp;analysis,
<span style=
'font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:blue'>COORD=</span><span class="normalitalicChar"><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; color:blue'>coord</span></span>
<span class="normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;font-style:normal'>is
optional</span></span><span class="normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; font-style:normal'>.&nbsp; If
it is omitted, the macro plot information will be written in the
local coordinates of the layer</span></span><span class=
"normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; font-style:normal'>.</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
5)&nbsp;&nbsp; <span style=
'font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:blue'>IA=</span><span class="normalitalicChar"><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; color:blue'>ia</span></span>
<span class="normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-family:"Times New Roman",serif;font-style:normal'>is only
required in the special case</span></span><span class=
"normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; font-style:normal'>&nbsp;when
the subcell in question is part of a triply periodic
RUC.</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
&nbsp;</p>
<span style=
'font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif'><br clear=
"all" style='page-break-before:always'></span>
<p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style='text-align:center'>

<h2 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc23046561"
id="_Toc23046561"></a><a name="_Toc26088731" id=
"_Toc26088731">*PATRAN</a>: <span class=
"StyleHeading214ptNotBoldChar"><span style=
'font-size:14.0pt'>PATRAN post-processing</span></span><span class=
"StyleHeading214ptNotBoldChar"><span style=
'font-size:14.0pt'>&nbsp;data output</span></span></h2>
</div>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='page-break-after:avoid'>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc23046562"
id="_Toc23046562"></a><a name="_Toc26088732" id=
"_Toc26088732">Purpose:</a></h3>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Generate data output&nbsp;files for
post-processing&nbsp;using the MSC/PATRAN&nbsp;software in
conjunction with the MACPOST&nbsp;software.&nbsp; The MACPOST
software is an add-on to the MSC/PATRAN software package that
enables generation of x-y plots and fringe plots.&nbsp; The MACPOST
software add-on is distributed with MAC/GMC 4.0 and has its own
User Manual (Goldberg <i>et al.</i>, 1999).&nbsp; The user is
referred to the MACPOST User Manual for specific instructions on
post-processing the data generated from MAC/GMC 4.0.&nbsp; Note
that the MSC/PATRAN output is available only for doubly and triply
periodic GMC RUC analyses.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc23046563"
id="_Toc23046563"></a><a name="_Toc26088733" id=
"_Toc26088733">Usage:</a></h3>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="Code10BoldCharCharCharCharChar1Char">*PATRAN</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp; TPRE=<span class="normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-size:11.0pt;font-family: "Times New Roman",serif'>tpre</span></span>
STP=<span class="normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif'>stp</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</p>
<table class="MsoNormalTable" border="0" cellspacing="0"
cellpadding="0" style='margin-left:5.4pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
<tr>
<td width="60" valign="top" style=
'width:45.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><u><span style=
'font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'>Name</span></u></p>
</td>
<td width="523" valign="top" style=
'width:5.45in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><u><span style=
'font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'>Definition</span></u></p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td width="60" valign="top" style=
'width:45.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><i>tpre</i></p>
</td>
<td width="523" valign="top" style=
'width:5.45in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal">Preloading time before which
MSC/PATRAN&nbsp;output&nbsp;data files are not written</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td width="60" valign="top" style=
'width:45.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><i>stp</i> <sup>1</sup></p>
</td>
<td width="523" valign="top" style=
'width:5.45in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal">Frequency for writing
MSC/PATRAN&nbsp;output,&nbsp;output is written every <i>stp</i>
time step</p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='page-break-after:avoid'>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc23046564"
id="_Toc23046564"></a><a name="_Toc26088734" id=
"_Toc26088734">Example:</a></h3>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="Code10BoldCharCharCharCharChar1Char">*PATRAN</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp; TPRE=57600. STP=50</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;</p>
<h3><a name="_Toc23046565" id="_Toc23046565"></a><a name=
"_Toc26088735" id="_Toc26088735">Associated MAC/GMC 4.0 Example
Problem(s):</a></h3>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><b>Example 6b</b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc23046566"
id="_Toc23046566"></a><a name="_Toc26088736" id=
"_Toc26088736">Notes:</a></h3>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
1)&nbsp;&nbsp; A small value of <i>stp</i> will cause a great deal
of data to be written and may slow execution&nbsp;considerably.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>

"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char1">
<b><span style=
'font-size:10.0pt'>*PATRAN</span></b></span>&nbsp;keyword causes
the generation of the following 14 data files, where <i>outfile</i>
is the MAC/GMC 4.0 output&nbsp;file&nbsp;name:</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
&nbsp;</p>

<h2 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc23046567"
id="_Toc23046567"></a><a name="_Toc26088737" id=
"_Toc26088737">*MATLAB</a>: <span class=
"StyleHeading214ptNotBoldChar"><span style=
'font-size:14.0pt'>MATLAB post-processing</span></span><span class=
"StyleHeading214ptNotBoldChar"><span style=
'font-size:14.0pt'>&nbsp;data output</span></span></h2>
</div>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='page-break-after:avoid'>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc23046568"
id="_Toc23046568"></a><a name="_Toc26088738" id=
"_Toc26088738">Purpose:</a></h3>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Generate data output&nbsp;files for
post-processing&nbsp;using the MATLAB&nbsp;software in conjunction
with the MATLAB source&nbsp;files distributed with MAC/GMC
4.0.&nbsp; The MATLAB output is available only for doubly periodic
RUC analysis&nbsp;and doubly periodic RUC layers within a
laminate&nbsp;analysis.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc23046569"
id="_Toc23046569"></a><a name="_Toc26088739" id=
"_Toc26088739">Usage:</a></h3>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="Code10BoldCharCharCharCharChar1Char">*MATLAB</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp; N=<span class="normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman",serif'>ntimes</span></span>
TIMES=<span class="normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-size:11.0pt;font-family: "Times New Roman",serif'>t(1),t(2),&hellip;,t(ntimes)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</p>
<table class="MsoNormalTable" border="0" cellspacing="0"
cellpadding="0" style='margin-left:5.4pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
<tr>
<td width="84" valign="top" style=
'width:63.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><u><span style=
'font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'>Name</span></u></p>
</td>
<td width="499" valign="top" style=
'width:5.2in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><u><span style=
'font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif'>Definition</span></u></p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td width="84" valign="top" style=
'width:63.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><i>ntimes</i></p>
</td>
<td width="499" valign="top" style=
'width:5.2in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal">Number of times at which
MATLAB&nbsp;output&nbsp;will be written</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td width="84" valign="top" style=
'width:63.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><i>t(1-ntimes)</i></p>
</td>
<td width="499" valign="top" style=
'width:5.2in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal">The times at which
MATLAB&nbsp;output&nbsp;will be written</p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='page-break-after:avoid'>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc23046570"
id="_Toc23046570"></a><a name="_Toc26088740" id=
"_Toc26088740">Example:</a></h3>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="Code10BoldCharCharCharCharChar1Char">*MATLAB</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp; N=3 TIMES=57600.,57700.,57800.</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;</p>
<h3><a name="_Toc23046571" id="_Toc23046571"></a><a name=
"_Toc26088741" id="_Toc26088741">Associated MAC/GMC 4.0 Example
Problem(s):</a></h3>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal">Example 3f, <b>Example 6c</b></p>
<p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc23046572"
id="_Toc23046572"></a><a name="_Toc26088742" id=
"_Toc26088742">Notes:</a></h3>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
1)&nbsp;&nbsp; The <span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char1">
<b><span style=
'font-size:10.0pt'>*MATLAB</span></b></span>&nbsp;keyword causes
the generation of the following 5 data files, where <i>outfile</i>
is the MAC/GMC 4.0 output&nbsp;file&nbsp;name:</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
&nbsp;</p>
<table class="MsoNormalTable" border="0" cellspacing="0"
cellpadding="0" style=
'margin-left:23.4pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
<tr>
<td width="156" valign="top" style=
'width:117.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<i><span style=
'font-size:10.0pt'>outfile</span></i></span><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>&shy;_x2.dat</span></span></p>
</td>
<td width="444" valign="top" style=
'width:333.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal">x<sub>2</sub> subcell coordinate geometry
information</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td width="156" valign="top" style=
'width:117.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<i><span style=
'font-size:10.0pt'>outfile</span></i></span><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>&shy;_x3.dat</span></span></p>
</td>
<td width="444" valign="top" style=
'width:333.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal">x<sub>3</sub> subcell coordinate geometry
information</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td width="156" valign="top" style=
'width:117.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<i><span style=
'font-size:10.0pt'>outfile</span></i></span><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>&shy;_sig.dat</span></span></p>
</td>
<td width="444" valign="top" style=
'width:333.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal">Subcell level stress data at each
output&nbsp;time</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td width="156" valign="top" style=
'width:117.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<i><span style=
'font-size:10.0pt'>outfile</span></i></span><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>&shy;_eps.dat</span></span></p>
</td>
<td width="444" valign="top" style=
'width:333.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal">Subcell level strain data at each
output&nbsp;time</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td width="156" valign="top" style=
'width:117.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<i><span style=
'font-size:10.0pt'>outfile</span></i></span><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>&shy;_epsp.dat</span></span></p>
</td>
<td width="444" valign="top" style=
'width:333.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal">Subcell level inelastic strain data at each
output&nbsp;time</p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in'>To be read by the
three MATLAB&nbsp;source&nbsp;files (see Note 2 below), the leading
&OpenCurlyDoubleQuote;<span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><i><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>outfile</span></i></span><span class="Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>&shy;_</span></span>&CloseCurlyDoubleQuote;
must be stripped from the <span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<i><span style=
'font-size:10.0pt'>outfile</span></i></span><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>&shy;_x2.dat</span></span>
and <span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<i><span style=
'font-size:10.0pt'>outfile</span></i></span><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>&shy;_x3.dat</span></span>
files.&nbsp; The remaining three MATLAB data files must contain
only the data for a single time, without the time itself
included.&nbsp; Thus, the user must copy the desired data out of
the <span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<i><span style=
'font-size:10.0pt'>outfile</span></i></span><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>&shy;_sig.dat</span></span>,
<span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<i><span style=
'font-size:10.0pt'>outfile</span></i></span><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>&shy;_eps.dat</span></span>,
and <span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<i><span style=
'font-size:10.0pt'>outfile</span></i></span><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>&shy;_epsp.dat</span></span>
files and copy it into the corresponding file with the leading
&OpenCurlyDoubleQuote;<span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><i><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>outfile</span></i></span><span class="Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar"><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>&shy;_</span></span>&CloseCurlyDoubleQuote;
stripped from the name.&nbsp; The MATLAB source files can then
correctly read these three data files and create the appropriate
fringe plots.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
2)&nbsp;&nbsp; The following MATLAB&nbsp;source&nbsp;files, which
generate fringe plots&nbsp;from the data contained in the MAC/GMC
4.0 MATLAB output&nbsp;files, are distributed with MAC/GMC 4.0:</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
<span class="normalitalicChar"><span style=
'font-family:"Times New Roman",serif; font-style:normal'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<table class="MsoNormalTable" border="0" cellspacing="0"
cellpadding="0" style=
'margin-left:23.4pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
<tr>
<td width="108" valign="top" style=
'width:81.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:10.0pt'>stress.m</span></span></p>
</td>
<td width="451" valign="top" style=
'width:4.7in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal">Generates stress component and invariant
fringe plots</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td width="108" valign="top" style=
'width:81.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:10.0pt'>strain.m</span></span></p>
</td>
<td width="451" valign="top" style=
'width:4.7in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal">Generates strain component fringe plots</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td width="108" valign="top" style=
'width:81.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:10.0pt'>epsp.m</span></span></p>
</td>
<td width="451" valign="top" style=
'width:4.7in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
<p class="MsoNormal">Generates inelastic strain component fringe
plots</p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in'>&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in'>Each file contains
an explanation and a section for user edits that control some of
the characteristics of the fringe plots.&nbsp; These
MATLAB&nbsp;source&nbsp;files are printed in the Appendix.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
&nbsp;</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>
3)&nbsp;&nbsp; The fringe plots&nbsp;can be generated by placing
the MATLAB&nbsp;source&nbsp;files and the MAC/GMC 4.0 MATLAB
output&nbsp;files in the MATLAB working directory, and then
executing&nbsp;the MATLAB source files by typing the file name at
the MATLAB command line.&nbsp; For example, typing
&OpenCurlyDoubleQuote;stress&CloseCurlyDoubleQuote; at the MATLAB
command line would execute the <span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:10.0pt'>stress.m</span></span> program to
generate the stress component fringe plots.</p>
<p class="MsoNormal" style='margin-left:.25in;text-indent:-.25in'>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=

<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=

<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>! -- Creep material
properties</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
CREEPCOEF = PV(1)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
POWER = PV(2)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>! -- Deviatoric stress&nbsp;
[S]&nbsp; in the subcell</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
TRACE3 = (SA(7) + SA(8) + SA(9)) / 3.</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
S(1) = SA(7) - TRACE3</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
S(2) = SA(8) - TRACE3</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
S(3) = SA(9) - TRACE3</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
S(4) = SA(10)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
S(5) = SA(11)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
S(6) = SA(12)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>! -- Effective
Stress</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
SEFF = SQRT((SA(7) - SA(8))**2 + (SA(8) - SA(9))**2 +
&</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(SA(7)
- SA(9))**2 + &</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
+ 6 * (SA(10)**2 + SA(11)**2 + SA(12)**2)) /
SQRT(2.)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
CREEP_F = CREEPCOEF * SEFF**POWER</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
IF (SEFF .GT. 0.D0) THEN</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
COEF = 3 * CREEP_F / (2 * SEFF)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
ELSE</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;COEF =
0.D0</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
ENDIF</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>! -- Inelastic strain
increments</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
DSA(13) = COEF * S(1) * TSTEP</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
DSA(14) = COEF * S(2) * TSTEP</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
DSA(15) = COEF * S(3) * TSTEP</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
DSA(16) = COEF * S(4) * TSTEP</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
DSA(17) = COEF * S(5) * TSTEP</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
DSA(18) = COEF * S(6) * TSTEP</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=

(MN .EQ. 2) THEN</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=

<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>! -- Copy appropriate viscoplastic
material constants</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
IF( NV .LT. 6 ) THEN</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
CALL FATALERROR(NIO)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
WRITE(NIO, *) ' NOT ENOUGH PV SPACE: NV =', NV</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
STOP</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
ENDIF</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
D0 = PV(1)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Z0 = PV(2)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Z1 = PV(3)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
BM = PV(4)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
AN = PV(5)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Q = PV(6)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>! -- Copy stress from [SA] to
[SS]</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
SS(1) = SA(7)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
SS(2) = SA(8)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
SS(3) = SA(9)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
SS(4) = SA(10)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
SS(5) = SA(11)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SS(6) = SA(12)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>! -- Compute the deviatoric stress
[S] in the subcell</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
TEMP = (SS(1) + SS(2) + SS(3)) / 3.0</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
S(1) = SS(1) - TEMP</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
S(2) = SS(2) - TEMP</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
S(3) = SS(3) - TEMP</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
S(4) = SS(4)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
S(5) = SS(5)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;S(6) = SS(6)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
AJ2 = 0.5 * (S(1)**2 + S(2)**2 + S(3)**2) + S(4)**2 + S(5)**2 +
&</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
S(6)**2</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
SQ3AJ = DSQRT( SS(1)**2 + SS(2)**2 + SS(3)**2 + 2 * (SS(4)**2 +
&</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
SS(5)**2 + SS(6)**2) )</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
SQ2 = 1.414215</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IF (SQ3AJ .EQ. 0.0)
THEN</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
DO I = 1, 6</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
R(I) = 0</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
END DO</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
ELSE</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
R(1) = SS(1) / SQ3AJ</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
R(2) = SS(2) / SQ3AJ</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
R(3) = SS(3) / SQ3AJ</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
R(4) = SQ2 * SS(4) / SQ3AJ</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;R(5) = SQ2 * SS(5) /
SQ3AJ</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
R(6) = SQ2 * SS(6) / SQ3AJ</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
ENDIF</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>! -- If D0=0 then assume elastic and
zero-out [DSA(13-30)] (inelastic</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>!&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; strain increments
and internal variable increments), then return</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
IF (D0 .EQ. 0) THEN</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
DO JJ = 13, 30</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
DSA(JJ) = 0.0</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
END DO</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
RETURN</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>! -- Inelastic</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
ELSE</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
ZEF = Z0 + Q * SA(20) + (1 - Q) * (R(1) * SA(21) + R(2) *
&</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
SA(22) + R(3) * SA(23) + R(4) * SA(24) + R(5) &</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
* SA(25) + R(6) * SA(26))</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
IF (AJ2 .EQ. 0.0) THEN</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
AL = 0.0</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
ELSE</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
ARG1 = ZEF**2.0 / (3.0 * AJ2)</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
IF (ARG1 .GT. 1E6) ARG1 = 1E6</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
CON = .5 * (AN + 1.0) / AN</span></span></p>
<p class="MsoNormal"><span class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar">
<span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
ARG = CON * (ARG1)**AN</span></span></p>

<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
#</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
# ------- User constitutive model&nbsp;example</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
MAT=Al(6061-0)</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;CMOD=99</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;NPE=2 NPV=6</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;NTP=6</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;TEM=21.0,148.9,204.4,260.0,371.1,400.0</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;E1=72.5E9,69.4E9,65.8E9,58.5E9,41.5E9,41.5E9</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;E2=0.33,0.33,0.33,0.33,0.33,0.33</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;ALPA=22.5E-6,22.5E-6,22.5E-6,22.5E-6,22.5E-6,22.5E-6</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;ALPT=22.5E-6,22.5E-6,22.5E-6,22.5E-6,22.5E-6,22.5E-6</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;V1=1.E4, 1.E4, 1.E4, 1.E4, 1.E4, 1.E4</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;V2=100.E6,100.E6,100.E6,100.E6,100.E6,100.E6</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;V3=190.E6,190.E6,190.E6,190.E6,190.E6,190.E6</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;V4=70.0,70.0,70.0,70.0,70.0,70.0</p>
<p class=

&nbsp;V5=10.0,7.0,4.0,1.6,0.55,0.55</p>
<p class=
"Code10CharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharCharChar1CharCharCharCharCharCharChar1Char2Char">
&nbsp;V6=0.4,0.4,0.4,0.4,0.4,0.4</p>
