<div class="WordSection20">
<div style=
'border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'>
<h2 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc26088760"
id="_Toc26088760"><span class=
"StyleHeading214ptNotBoldChar"><span style=
'font-size:14.0pt'>MATLAB</span></span></a><span class=
"StyleHeading214ptNotBoldChar"><span style=
'font-size:14.0pt'>&nbsp;source</span></span><span class=
"StyleHeading214ptNotBoldChar"><span style=
'font-size:14.0pt'>&nbsp;files for generation of fringe
plots</span></span></h2>
</div>
<h3 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc26088761"
id="_Toc26088761"><b><span style=
'font-family:"Courier New";text-decoration:none'>stress.m</span></b></a></h3>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
stress.m MATLAB</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;source</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;file&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Distributed with MAC/GMC 4.0</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% This
program will generate fringe plots</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;with the MATLAB</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;software</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% from the
data written to ASCII</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;files by MAC/GMC 4.0 using the</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%
*MATLAB</span><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;option</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% This
program reads the file sig.dat, which contains 8
columns:</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
S11&nbsp; S22&nbsp; S33&nbsp; S23&nbsp; S13&nbsp; S12&nbsp;
Smean&nbsp; Seff</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% NOTE: Smean
= (S11 + S22 + S33) / 3.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Seff =
sqrt(3*sij*sij/2) (sij = deviatoric stresses)</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
= [1/sqrt(2)] * sqrt[(S11 - S22)**2 + (S22 - S33)**2 +</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
(S11 - S33)**2 + 6*(S23**2 + S13**2 + S12**2)]</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% While the
ASCII</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;output</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;file</span><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>s
from MAC/GMC 4.0 contain data for</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% all
specified times (and integration</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;points</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;for laminate</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>), the</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% sig.dat
file should contain just the stress field data for the</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% one
particular time (and integration</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;point) at which the fringe</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% plots will
be made.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% In
addition, this program reads the files x2.dat and
x3.dat,</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% which are
also generated by MAC/GMC 4.0 to define the subcell</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% grid.&nbsp;
Note that this grid will differ between GMC and
HFGMC</span><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Clear
workspace</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>clear;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;USER
OPTIONS</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Select
stress components to plot (1 - plot, 0 - don't plot)</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>ns11 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>ns22 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>ns33 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>ns23 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>ns13 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>ns12 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>nsm =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>nse =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Select
subplot (all on one Fig.) or individual Figs.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; nsub = 1 --&gt;
subplot</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; nsub = 0 --&gt; individual
Figs.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>nsub =
0;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Set
scale_spec = 1 to specify scale high and low values for
each</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; component - set values
below</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>scale_spec =
0;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>if scale_spec
&gt; 0</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; s11_low = -200;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; s11_high = 500;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; s22_low = -200;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; s22_high = 500;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; s33_low = -200;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; s33_high = 500;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; s23_low = -200;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; s23_high = 500;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; s13_low = -200;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; s13_high = 500;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; s12_low = -200;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; s12_high = 500;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sm_low = -200;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sm_high = 500;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; se_low = -200;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; se_high = 500;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Set
average = 1 to perform averaging of tractions across
subcell</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; boundaries.&nbsp; This
reproduces the average sense imposition of the</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; traction continuity
conditions in HFGMC</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Set
average = 0 for no averaging.&nbsp; Use average = 0 for
GMC.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>average =
0;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Set nint
= number of integration</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;points</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;in HFGMC</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;when average = 1</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>if average
&gt; 0</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; nint = 11;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Note: To
draw subcell boundaries, change "shading interp"</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
to "shading faceted" (GMC only)</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
END USER OPTIONS</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Load
x1.dat and x2.dat files and determine their sizes</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>load
x2.dat;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>m =
length(x2);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>load
x3.dat;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>n =
length(x3);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Create
grid</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>[X,Y] =
meshgrid(x3,x2);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Load
sig.dat file</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>load
sig.dat;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>f=1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>for
i=1:m;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp; for
j=1:n;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sig11(i,j) =
sig(f,1);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sig22(i,j) =
sig(f,2);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sig33(i,j) =
sig(f,3);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sig23(i,j) =
sig(f,4);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sig13(i,j) =
sig(f,5);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sig12(i,j) =
sig(f,6);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sigmean(i,j) =
sig(f,7);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sigeff(i,j) =
sig(f,8);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;f=f+1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;
end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% Section to
average boundary tractions</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=

'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Nbeta
=length(x2)/nint;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; for j=1:n</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; for
i=1:Nbeta-1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
sig22(nint*i,j) = 0.5*(sig22(nint*i,j) +
sig22(nint*i+1,j));</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
sig22(nint*i+1,j) = sig22(nint*i,j);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
sig23(nint*i,j) = 0.5*(sig23(nint*i,j) +
sig23(nint*i+1,j));</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
sig23(nint*i+1,j) = sig23(nint*i,j);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Ngama =
length(x3)/nint;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; for i=1:m</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; for
j=1:Ngama-1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

sig33(i,nint*j+1));</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
sig33(i,nint*j+1) = sig33(i,nint*j);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
sig23(i,nint*j) = 0.5*(sig23(i,nint*j) +
sig23(i,nint*j+1));</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
sig23(i,nint*j+1) = sig23(i,nint*j);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; end</span></p>

<h3 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc26088762"
id="_Toc26088762"><b><span style=
'font-family:"Courier New";text-decoration:none'>strain.m</span></b></a></h3>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
strain.m MATLAB</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;source</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;file&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Distributed with MAC/GMC 4.0</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% This
program will generate fringe plots</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;with the MATLAB</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;software</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% from the
data written to ASCII</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;files by MAC/GMC 4.0 using the</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%
*MATLAB</span><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;option</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% This
program reads the file epsp.dat, which contains 6
columns:</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
e11&nbsp;&nbsp; e22&nbsp;&nbsp; e33&nbsp;&nbsp; e23&nbsp;&nbsp;
e13&nbsp;&nbsp; e12</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ** NOTE: shear strains
are engineering shears **</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% While the
ASCII</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;output</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;file</span><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>s
from MAC/GMC 4.0 contain data for</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% all
specified times (and integration</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;points</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;for laminate</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>), the</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% eps.dat
file should contain just the strain field data for the</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% one
particular time (and integration</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;point) at which the fringe</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% plots will
be made.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% In
addition, this program reads the files x2.dat and
x3.dat,</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% which are
also generated by MAC/GMC 4.0 to define the subcell</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% grid.&nbsp;
Note that this grid will differ between GMC and
HFGMC</span><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Clear
workspace</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>clear;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
USER OPTIONS</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>

strain components to plot (1 - plot, 0 - don't plot)</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>ne11 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>ne22 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>ne33 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>ne23 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>ne13 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>ne12 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Select
subplot (all on one Fig.) or individual Figs.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; nsub = 1 --&gt;
subplot</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; nsub = 0 --&gt; individual
Figs.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>nsub =
0</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Set
scale_spec = 1 to specify scale high and low values for
each</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; component - set values
below</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>scale_spec =
0;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>if scale_spec
&gt; 0</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e11_low = -0.020;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e11_high = 0.025;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e22_low = -0.020;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e22_high = 0.025;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e33_low = -0.020;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e33_high = 0.025;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e23_low = -0.020;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e23_high = 0.025;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e13_low = -0.020;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e13_high = 0.025;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e12_low = -0.020;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; e12_high = 0.025;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>end</span></p>

'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Note: To
draw subcell boundaries, change "shading interp"</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
to "shading faceted" (GMC only)</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;END USER OPTIONS</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Load
x1.dat and x2.dat files and determine their sizes</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>load
x2.dat;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>m =
length(x2);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>load
x3.dat;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>n =
length(x3);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Create
grid</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>[X,Y] =
meshgrid(x3,x2);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% Load
eps.dat file</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>load
eps.dat;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>f=1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>for
i=1:m;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp; for
j=1:n;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eps11(i,j) =
eps(f,1);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eps22(i,j) =
eps(f,2);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eps33(i,j) =
eps(f,3);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eps23(i,j) =
eps(f,4);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eps13(i,j) =
eps(f,5);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eps12(i,j) =
eps(f,6);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; f=f+1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;
end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>if nsub &gt;
0</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; num_plots = ne11 + ne22 + ne33
+ ne23 + ne12 + ne13;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if num_plots == 1</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; n1 =
2;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; n2 =
2;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; elseif num_plots ==
2</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; n1 =
2;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; n2 =
2;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; elseif num_plots ==
3</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; n1 =
2;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; n2 =
2;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; elseif num_plots ==
4</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; n1 =
2;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; n2 =
2;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; elseif num_plots ==
5</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; n1 =
3;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; n2 =
3;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; elseif num_plots ==
6</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; n1 =
3;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; n2 =
3;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>num =
0;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>if nsub &gt;
0</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; figure;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; hold on;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- e11
plot</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>if ne11 &gt;
0</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; num = num + 1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; if nsub &gt; 0</span></p>

'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=

<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=

'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; hold
on;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>

<h3 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><a name="_Toc26088763"
id="_Toc26088763"><b><span style=
'font-family:"Courier New";text-decoration:none'>epsp</span></b></a><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New";text-decoration:none'>.m</span></b></h3>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
epsp.m MATLAB</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;source</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;file&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Distributed with MAC/GMC 4.0</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% This
program will generate fringe plots</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;with the MATLAB</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;software</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% from the
data written to ASCII</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;files by MAC/GMC 4.0 using the</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%
*MATLAB</span><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;option</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% This
program reads the file epsp.dat, which contains 8
columns:</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ep11&nbsp;
ep22&nbsp; ep33&nbsp; ep23&nbsp; ep13&nbsp; ep12&nbsp; ep_eq&nbsp;
matnum</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ** NOTE: inelastic shear
strains are engineering shears **</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% NOTE: In
the case of incremental plasticity</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;constit model,</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ep_eq is
the integrated equivalent plastic strain</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;increment</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; where
dep_eq = sqrt(2*deijp*deijp/3)</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; For other
constit models, ep_eq = sqrt(2*eijp*eijp/3)</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; see
Mendelson, A. (1968) Plasticity: Theory and Application.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% While the
ASCII</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;output</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;file</span><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>s
from MAC/GMC 4.0 contain data for</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% all
specified times (and integration</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;points</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;for laminate</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>), the</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% epsp.dat
file should contain just the inelastic strain field data</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% for the one
particular time (and integration</span><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;point) at which the</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% fringe
plots</span><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;will be
made.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% In
addition, this program reads the files x2.dat and
x3.dat,</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% which are
also generated by MAC/GMC 4.0 to define the subcell</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% grid.&nbsp;
Note that this grid will differ between GMC and
HFGMC</span><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------%</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Clear
workspace</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>clear;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
USER OPTIONS</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Select
inelastic strain components to plot (1 - plot, 0 - don't
plot)</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>nep11 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>nep22 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>nep33 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>nep23 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>nep13 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>nep12 =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>nepeq =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>nmatn =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Select
subplot (all on one Fig.) or individual Figs.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; nsub = 1 --&gt;
subplot</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; nsub = 0 --&gt; individual
Figs.</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>nsub =
0;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Set
scale_spec = 1 to specify scale high and low values for
each</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; component - set values
below</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>scale_spec =
1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>if scale_spec
&gt; 0</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ep11_low = -0.005;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ep11_high = 0.015;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ep22_low = -0.005;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ep22_high = 0.015;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ep33_low = -0.005;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ep33_high = 0.015;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ep23_low = -0.005;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ep23_high = 0.015;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ep13_low = -0.005;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ep13_high = 0.015;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ep12_low = -0.005;</span></p>

'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>

'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; epeq_low = 0.0;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=

'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; matn_low = 0;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=

<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Load
x1.dat and x2.dat files and determine their sizes</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>load
x2.dat;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>m =
length(x2);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>load
x3.dat;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>n =
length(x3);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% -- Create
grid</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>[X,Y] =
meshgrid(x3,x2);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>% Load
epsp.dat file</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>load
epsp.dat;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>f=1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>for
i=1:m;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp; for
j=1:n;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eps11p(i,j) =
epsp(f,1);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eps22p(i,j) =
epsp(f,2);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eps33p(i,j) =
epsp(f,3);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eps23p(i,j) =
epsp(f,4);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eps13p(i,j) =
epsp(f,5);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; eps12p(i,j) =
epsp(f,6);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; epspq(i,j) =
epsp(f,7);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; matnum(i,j) =
epsp(f,8);</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; f=f+1;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style='font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;
end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>end</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p class="MsoPlainText"><span style=
'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>

'font-size:8.0pt'>%------------------------------------------------------------------</span></p>

'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;</span></p>

nep33 + nep23 + nep12 + nep13 + nepeq + nmatn;</span></p>

2;</span></p>

2;</span></p>

'font-size:8.0pt'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; elseif num_plots ==
2</span></p>

2;</span></p>

3;</span></p>
